arg.g: from the steadfastness of the Messenger of Allah, his patience and his jihad and his refusal to compromise and concede.

example.arg: من عزيمة رسول الله -LRB- ص -RRB- و صبر ه و جهاد ه و رفض ه المساومة و التنازل .
